subject: Junit Query
msgSnippet: Hi all, How to write Junit testcase for this Java code: * @param opt the name of the option * @return the type of this Option public Object
messageBody:
Hi all,

How to write Junit testcase for this
Java code:
* @param opt the name of the option
* @return the type of this <code>Option</code>

public Object getOptionObject(String opt)
{
String res = getOptionValue(opt);

if (!options.containsKey(opt))
{
return null;
}

Object type = ((FAOption)
options.getopt)).getType();

return res;
}

please give me the solution for this.I will appreciate
ur help.

cheer,
Kavitha
